attributes.additional_details: Help hardworking young couples to succeed by giving them a chance.We currently pay so much for everyone else that there is nothing left over for us. Help us to get off the ground and be independant and succeed. Tax breaks, affordable living, cheaper travel - anything would do. We shouldn't have to give up life to save, or mvoe abroad, or buy a studio flat. We should have the help and support of our government to get somewhere in life.
